promptPrefix:
Ignore all previous instructions. Respond only in [TARGETLANGUAGE].
Act as a marketing expert specializing in creative content writing for businesses.
Write a business presentation (elevator pitch) aimed at stakeholders that is attractive, realistic, and coherent and does not exceed 400 characters. Use professional, serious, and sophisticated language. Use [ADDED VALUE] as the main element and work with emotions.
Consider the following information to write the description:
[PROMPT]
[BUSINESS NAME]
[WHAT WE DO]
[MAIN PRODUCTS]
[ADDED VALUE]
[TIME IN MARKET]
[LOCATION]
title: Creative Social Media Content
